article_title: MU plans to buy Douglass Centre

article_metadata.author: JEAN TARBETT HARDIMANHerald-Dispatch.com

og.description: HUNTINGTON — Marshall University is planning to buy the Douglass Centre property for $780,000 from the Huntington Municipal Development Authority, with plans to continue the Ebenezer Medical Outreach program for
